trans-unit.source: Represents an error that occurs in redirection processing.
trans-unit.target: Vertegenwoordigt een fout die bij het verwerken van omleiding optreedt.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Channels.RedirectionException"></xref> class with the specified <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo"></xref> and <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext>.
trans-unit.target: Initialiseert een nieuw exemplaar van de <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Channels.RedirectionException"> </xref> klasse met de opgegeven <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo"> </xref> en <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext>.</xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Channels.RedirectionException"></xref> class with the specified <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Channels.RedirectionType"></xref>, <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Channels.RedirectionDuration"></xref>, <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Channels.RedirectionScope"></xref>, and array of <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Channels.RedirectionLocation"></xref> objects.
trans-unit.target: Initialiseert een nieuw exemplaar van de <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Channels.RedirectionException"> </xref> klasse met de opgegeven <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Channels.RedirectionType"> </xref>, <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Channels.RedirectionDuration"> </xref>, <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Channels.RedirectionScope"> </xref>, en matrix van <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Channels.RedirectionLocation"> </xref> objecten.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Channels.RedirectionException"></xref> with the specified <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Channels.RedirectionType"></xref>, <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Channels.RedirectionDuration"></xref>, <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Channels.RedirectionScope"></xref>, inner exception, and array of <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Channels.RedirectionLocation"></xref> objects.
trans-unit.target: Initialiseert een nieuw exemplaar van de <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Channels.RedirectionException"> </xref> met de opgegeven <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Channels.RedirectionType"> </xref>, <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Channels.RedirectionDuration"> </xref>, <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Channels.RedirectionScope"> </xref>, binnenste uitzondering en matrix van <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Channels.RedirectionLocation"> </xref> objecten.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Channels.RedirectionException"></xref> class with the specified message, <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Channels.RedirectionType"></xref>, <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Channels.RedirectionDuration"></xref>, <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Channels.RedirectionScope"></xref>, and array of <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Channels.RedirectionLocation"></xref> objects.
trans-unit.target: Initialiseert een nieuw exemplaar van de <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Channels.RedirectionException"> </xref> klasse met het opgegeven bericht <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Channels.RedirectionType"> </xref>, <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Channels.RedirectionDuration"> </xref>, <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Channels.RedirectionScope"> </xref>, en matrix van <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Channels.RedirectionLocation"> </xref> objecten.

trans-unit.source: The message that describes the current exception.
trans-unit.target: Het bericht dat de huidige uitzondering wordt beschreven.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Channels.RedirectionException"></xref> with the specified message string, <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Channels.RedirectionType"></xref>, <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Channels.RedirectionDuration"></xref>, <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Channels.RedirectionScope"></xref>, inner exception, and array of <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Channels.RedirectionLocation"></xref> objects.
trans-unit.target: Initialiseert een nieuw exemplaar van de <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Channels.RedirectionException"> </xref> met de tekenreeks opgegeven bericht <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Channels.RedirectionType"> </xref>, <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Channels.RedirectionDuration"> </xref>, <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Channels.RedirectionScope"> </xref>, binnenste uitzondering en matrix van <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Channels.RedirectionLocation"> </xref> objecten.

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Channels.RedirectionDuration"></xref> associated with the current <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Channels.RedirectionException"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Haalt de <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Channels.RedirectionDuration"> </xref> die zijn gekoppeld aan de huidige <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Channels.RedirectionException"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The redirection duration associated with the exception.
trans-unit.target: De duur van de omleiding die zijn gekoppeld aan de uitzondering.

trans-unit.source: Sets the <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo"></xref> with information about the exception.
trans-unit.target: Stelt de <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo"> </xref> met informatie over de uitzondering.

trans-unit.source: Gets a collection of <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Channels.RedirectionLocation"></xref> objects associated with the current <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Channels.RedirectionException"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Hiermee wordt een verzameling <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Channels.RedirectionLocation"> </xref> objecten die zijn gekoppeld aan de huidige <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Channels.RedirectionException"> </xref>.
Haalt de <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Channels.RedirectionScope"> </xref> die zijn gekoppeld aan de <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Channels.RedirectionException"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The redirection scope associated with the exception.
trans-unit.target: Het bereik omleiding is gekoppeld aan de uitzondering.
Haalt de <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Channels.RedirectionType"> </xref> die zijn gekoppeld aan de <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Channels.RedirectionException"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The redirection type associated with the exception.
trans-unit.target: Het type omleiding is gekoppeld aan de uitzondering.
